com.dreamlink.aidl

接口 Communication

  • 所有已知实现类:
    Communication.Stub

    public interface Communication

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 接口和说明
      static class  Communication.Stub
      Local-side IPC implementation stub class.

    • 方法概要

      方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      List<User> getAllUser()
      get all of users in connect
      User getLocalUser() 
      void registListenr(OnCommunicationListenerExternal lis, int appid)
      register call back listener with your application id. when you use IPC ,please register call back listener first
      void sendMessage(byte[] msg, int appID, User user)
      send message to user
      void sendMessageToAll(byte[] msg, int appID)
      send message to all of users
      void unRegistListenr(OnCommunicationListenerExternal lis)
      unregister call back listener.

    • 方法详细资料

      • registListenr

        void registListenr(OnCommunicationListenerExternal lis,
                 int appid)
                   throws RemoteException
        register call back listener with your application id. when you use IPC ,please register call back listener first
        参数:
        lis - OnCommunicationListenerExternal
        抛出:
        RemoteException

      • sendMessage

        void sendMessage(byte[] msg,
               int appID,
               User user)
                 throws RemoteException
        send message to user
        参数:
        msg - the data will be send
        appID - your application id ,define in manifest meta-data
        user - which user will be send to
        抛出:
        RemoteException

      • getAllUser

        List<User> getAllUser()
                      throws RemoteException
        get all of users in connect
        抛出:
        RemoteException

      • unRegistListenr

        void unRegistListenr(OnCommunicationListenerExternal lis)
                     throws RemoteException
        unregister call back listener. when you don't use the IPC ,please unregister call back
        参数:
        lis - OnCommunicationListenerExternal
        抛出:
        RemoteException

      • getLocalUser

        User getLocalUser()
                  throws RemoteException
        抛出:
        RemoteException

      • sendMessageToAll

        void sendMessageToAll(byte[] msg,
                    int appID)
                      throws RemoteException
        send message to all of users
        参数:
        msg - the data will be send
        appID - your application id ,define in manifest meta-data
        抛出:
        RemoteException
